data.name: Fall of Nojpetén
data.desc: One Yuc military campaign to conquer last non-subjugated Maya city or town in Yuc
data.agents_sp: Gov Martín de Ursúa y Arismendi, Pedro de Zubiaur 130 men
data.agents_nsp0: Kan Ek’, Aj Kowoj, Aj Chan, Chamach Xulu
data.note: 1699 Nojpeten. Gen Urzúa [Yuc] formally transfers the recently conquered province of the Itzas [Peten] to Gen Melchor de Mencos [Guat], as ordered by Sp King Carlos II /v Soza [missg] = ed 2 vol 2 p 481
